thread.title: Ayse
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Ayse

author: Ayse
title: Ayse
text: The minute I came in, I was acknowledged right away. I did not have to wait, someone came and checked me in for the service right away. I had a nail in my tire, I took most of the afternoon off based on past experiences, so you can imagine my surprise when I was in and out within less than the 45 minutes they had promise me. They were very courteous and professional, it was a real pleasure to do business here.
